verses.roman:
eka vipra dekhi' āilā prabhura vyavahāra
prakāśānanda-āge kahe caritra tāṅhāra

synonyms: eka vipra—one brāhmaṇa; dekhi'-seeing; āilā—came; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vyavahāra—activities; prakāśānanda-āge—before the Māyāvādī sannyāsī Prakāśānanda; kahe—says; caritra tāṅhāra—His characteristics.
translation: One brāhmaṇa who saw the wonderful behavior of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu came to Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī and described the Lord's characteristics.
